TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Adorner extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 管理与用户界面相关的 对象的集合。 此类不能被继承。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>可以启用和禁用。 仅启用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>对象将接收从命中的测试和绘制消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>可以查看为用户界面之间的代理相关的元素，其中包含的所有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>对象，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。
有关详细信息，请参阅[行为服务概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>类与交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

Docs.related: 如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.%23ctor%2A>构造函数创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.GlyphCollection>和默认情况下启用。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> 类的新实例。 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: 获取或设置与 关联的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>，该集合设置此属性，以便<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>可回调到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否能够启用。
Docs.value: 如果启用了 ，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Enabled%2A>属性是`true`，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类将发送`HitTest`并`Paint`向消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何启用和禁用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner>。 完整代码列表，请参阅[如何：扩展的外观和行为的控件在设计模式下](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171820(v=vs.120))。
